entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
